titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2011 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Select Committee on Intelligence. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Feinstein. With written report No. 112-12. Additional and Minority views filed.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 25.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
